post:
PakCloudHost is Pakistan based registered web hosting company. We are pleased to offer shared hosting to LET clients with following features: 
* cPanel Control Panel
* Softaculous (1-click Installer)
* Attracta SEO and Marketing Tools
* Python App setup
* SitePad Website Builder
* JetBackup
* CloudLinux OS
* LiteSpeed server
* Imunify360
* 24/7 Fastest Support
* 99.99% Server Uptime
* Instant Activation

We are offering following Packages:
**Package: Basic (Hosting Only)**
2GB Web Space
10GB Bandwidth
1 ٖFTP Account
5 Email Account
1 MySQL Database
1 Subdomain
Price: $8.38/year
Order Link: https://www.pakcloudhost.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=17

**Package: Basic Plus (Hosting Only)**
5GB Web Space
25GB Bandwidth
3 ٖFTP Account
30 Email Account
10 MySQL Database
30 Subdomain
3 Addon Domains
3 Parked Domains
Price: $12.73/year
Order Link: https://www.pakcloudhost.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=18

**Package:  Medium (Hosting Only)**
10GB Web Space
50GB Bandwidth
10 ٖFTP Accounts
50 Email Accounts
30 MySQL Databases
50 Subdomains
10 Addon Domains
10 Parked Domains
Price: $17.09/year
Order Link: https://www.pakcloudhost.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=19

Payment method:
PayPal 
[Note: PayPal Fees ($0.30 + 9.85%) will be applicable.]

Regards
